predicate.note: Frames file for 'inundate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to swamp or overwhelm as if with a flood

example.name: passive
example.text: Suddenly , on television , in advertisements and on their cereal boxes , Americans were inundated [*-1] with news about the obscure seed .
example.arg: on television , in advertisements and on their cereal boxes
